description: The tools installation info on Mac/Windows/Linux OS.

os.description: Operating system for which the tool is to be installed.

arch.description: Architecture for which the tool is to be installed.

id.description: The ID of the tool which is used to identify whether the tool is installed or not. For example, 'brew' for Homebrew, 'Visual Studio Code.app' for Visual Studio Code, etc.

type.description: Type of the installation tool. Toolkit will use different methods to install the package based on the type.

source.description: The Source which how to download and install the tool.

postInstall.description: The command to run after the installation of the tool.

installType.description: The type of installation. 'parallel' installs all the tools in parallel, 'sequential' installs the tools one by one.
